originalText.text: If you are looking for frills this is not the place for you, but if you are looking for an excellent strong massage I highly recommend. I will definitely return! Great value.

text.text: If you are looking for frills this is not the place for you, but if you are looking for an excellent strong massage I highly recommend. I will definitely return! Great value.

originalText.text: Love this place! I have been coming here for years and even now I have moved away, I travel back regularly to get a good massage! I highly recommend these people. They know their craft and the price is also very reasonable. You will love this place!

text.text: Love this place! I have been coming here for years and even now I have moved away, I travel back regularly to get a good massage! I highly recommend these people. They know their craft and the price is also very reasonable. You will love this place!

authorAttribution.displayName: Viva La L - NYC de Norma Leal

originalText.text: I went this place because the good reviews, but sadly my experience was totally different: I got an 1 hour massage, $60 but when I was gonna pay they showed me a banner that it says: Tip: $20, so I had to pay $80 + taxes, almost $90‚Ä¶. When the massage, the lady asked me if I want something in my face, it lasted less than 2 minutes‚Ä¶ If the $20+ was for it‚Ä¶ Honestly, I was mocked and feel stressed and sad; I never had this kind of experience.

originalText.text: They have done it again first shot out to Jerry today was the first time I actually had a male rather than that I usually have the females there they are so welcoming I feel like a million bucks let me tell you $50 an hour is well worth it  This is my favorite local spot to go to.  I usually go twice a month because the price is great they're very welcoming and they target the spots that need to be released and that's the most important thingüí™üóù
